subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: David Duval, the former No. 1 golfer in the world, had not been near the top of a leader board for years until he finished tied for second at Bethpage.
snippet: David Duval, the former No. 1 golfer in the world, had not been near the top of a leader board for years until he finished tied for second at Bethpage.
